data.comment: The match is underway at Audi Field.
Throw-in DC United.
In the minute 1, Free kick for New England in the half of DC United.
New England surge into the attack at Audi Field but Tajon Buchanan’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 5, Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for New England, close to DC United's area.
In the minute 8, New England are coming forward and Gustavo Bou gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
Griffin Yow gets his shot on target but fails to score for DC United.
In the minute 11, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
DC United's Moses Nyeman gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 13, Alex Chilowicz awards New England a goal kick.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to New England.
New England have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in DC United.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United close to the penalty box.
In the minute 22, DC United drives forward and Yordy Reyna gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for New England in the half of DC United.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England.
In the minute 25, In Washington, D.C., Henry Kessler (New England) misses the target with a header.
DC United have a goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, New England have a dangerous throw-in.
In Washington, D.C. New England attack through Matt Polster. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 28, Important block from the New England defence as Ola Kamara fires in a strike for DC United.
DC United are pushing forward but Junior Moreno's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 29, Throw-in high up the field for New England in Washington, D.C..
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 31, DC United to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
In the minute 34, DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as DC United is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, New England drive upfield and Gustavo Bou gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a DC United defender.
New England pushes forward through Lee Nguyen, whose finish on goal is saved.
Frederic Brillant is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 38, Free kick DC United.
Frederic Brillant returns to the field for DC United after picking up a slight injury.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a New England throw-in in DC United's half.
New England to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
In the minute 42, Play has been interrupted briefly in Washington, D.C. To check on Matt Polster, who is grimacing with pain.
Alex Chilowicz will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in DC United.
New England are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 45, Gustavo Bou (New England) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for New England in the half of DC United.
Corner awarded to New England.
In the minute 45, Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside DC United's half?
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Tommy McNamara (New England) has replaced the possibly injured Matt Polster.
At Audi Field, Frederic Brillant has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Free kick for New England in their own half.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in DC United's half?
DC United will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from New England.
New England attack but Brandon Bye's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 48, DC United have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 50, In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
DC United needs to be cautious. New England have an attacking throw-in.
DC United's Joseph Mora has been booked in Washington, D.C..
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for New England in Washington, D.C..
Free kick for New England in the half of DC United.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
In the minute 52, New England have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tommy McNamara (New England) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 55, Alex Chilowicz awards DC United a goal kick.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to DC United.
Alex Chilowicz signals a New England throw-in in DC United's half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for DC United in their own half.
Throw-in New England.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Ola Kamara of DC United is pulled up for offside.
DC United awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz signals a throw-in for New England, close to DC United's area.
In the minute 61, New England surge into the attack at Audi Field but Teal Bunbury’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Can DC United get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
In the minute 62, DC United drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Teal Bunbury for New England gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a DC United goal kick.
In the minute 64, New England push upfield but Alex Chilowicz quickly pulls them for offside.
Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to DC United in their own half.
Free kick DC United.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Lee Nguyen with Diego Fagundez.
Bruce Arena (New England) is making a third substitution, with Cristian Penilla replacing Tajon Buchanan.
Alex Chilowicz awards the away team a throw-in.
Erik Sorga is replacing Ola Kamara for the home team.
In the minute 68, The home team have replaced Yordy Reyna with Federico Higuain. This is the second substitution made today by Ben Olsen.
DC United have been awarded a corner by Alex Chilowicz.
In the minute 69, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
Alex Chilowicz awards DC United a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Free kick for New England in their own half.
DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Free kick New England.
Julian Gressel is on a sub for Griffin Yow for DC United.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
Diego Fagundez (New England) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for DC United at Audi Field.
Federico Higuain of DC United smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to New England.
Free kick for DC United in their own half.
In the minute 79, New England make their fourth substitution with Adam Buksa replacing Teal Bunbury.
In the minute 80, DC United awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for New England in the half of DC United.
New England to take a throw-in in DC United territory.
Oniel Fisher is replacing Joseph Mora for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 81, Junior Moreno for DC United has been booked by Alex Chilowicz and receives a first yellow card.
Ben Olsen is making the team's fourth substitution at Audi Field with Gelmin Rivas replacing Yamil Asad.
In the minute 82, In Washington, D.C. A free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for DC United in their own half.
Throw-in for DC United at Audi Field.
In the minute 84, DC United's Gelmin Rivas misses with an attempt on goal.
New England have a goal kick.
New England's Adam Buksa breaks free at Audi Field. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 85, It's a goal kick for the home team in Washington, D.C..
Goal! New England have got their heads in front thanks to a Gustavo Bou strike.
That's a fine assist from Cristian Penilla.
In the minute 87, Alex Chilowicz signals a free kick to New England.
DC United have a goal kick.
Throw-in DC United.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for DC United in the half of New England.
Alex Chilowicz signals a DC United throw-in in New England's half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
New England needs to be cautious. DC United have an attacking throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Adam Buksa puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Cristian Penilla with an assist there.
